title: ECR 1.7.0: OMNISSIAH'S BATTLEFIELD ARRAY
content:
New content:
  • Big in-match UI update, including weapon panel, tasks panel, minimap, compasses, map (M), death screen, Hall of Fame, updated old menus and icons
  • Cosmetic updates for 5 Chaos Legions and 5 Space Marine Chapters
Fixes:
  • Spawn changes to prevent spawning and floor, behind transport when it's moving backwards, other disappointing situations
  • Grenades and weapon projectiles should now move more smoothly on clients
  • Changes for elevators movement to make it more comfortable
  • Changes to make melee more smooth
  • Shooting near railings is fixed in buildings
  • Throwing grenades near railings is now more comfortable
  • Executions positioning fixes
  • Handbrake for bike, bike physics are now more comfortable
Balance:
  • Whirlwind is now artillery
  • In Promethium, Maggon Hold The Line mode time was increased
  • In Valorous Salvation Supremacy time granted by points was decreased
  • In Cycladon Sumpremacy initial time was decreased
  • Power Swords and Axes damage reduced, knife damage increased
  • Stuns from Jump Pack are now short
  • Plasma pistol charge time increased
  • Vanguard Veteran health, shield reduced
  • Plasma Cannon, Las Cannon damage increased
  • Bike health decreased, XP cost decreased

title: ECR 1.6.5
content:
New content:
  • Grenade and plasma trajectory
  • Markers for Jump Pack attacks from above
  • Camera mode now switches automatically near railings for non-Devastators
Fixes:
  • Duel round is now 3 minute, after 2 minutes all enemies become visible
  • Item usage on allies improved
  • Improvements to an issue with visibly not rotating turrets
  • Improvements to an issue with vaulting non happening
  • Fixed bolter shells staying in air
  • Vehicle movement input network optimizations
  • Fall damage now shouldn't kill players

title: ECR 1.6.4
content:
Fixes:
  • A more successful attempt to fix turret detachment
  • Fixed a possibility to fire an ATGM without cooldown
  • On Valorant Salvation added crates and fixed Terminator not being able to walk upstairs
  • Some new localization updates

title: ECR 1.6.3
content:
Fixes:
  • Animation update rate fixed
  • Added custom keybinds for camera distance and switching weapons
  • Weapons can now be switched while sprinting
  • Attempts to fix nameplates while in vehicle and turret detachments
  • Sensitivity on vehicles reduced
Balance:
  • Bolter pistol spread reduced
  • Auto cannon armor penetration increased

title: ECR 1.6.2
content:
New content:
  • Weapon recoil
  • Secondary weapons are given to more than half of the classes
Fixes:
  • Tyranids now have names
  • Problem with strong attack and defense dash interaction solved
  • Main menu music problems fixed (such as playing 2 tracks in the same time)
  • No more falling Devastators: vault over keybinding changed to Shift+Space
  • Issues with discord notifications about matches fixed
  • It's no more possible to use shield when stamina reaches 0
  • Point widgets transparency is now 0.5
Balance:
  • New stamina penalties: when it reaches 0, it's now no more possible to use melee attacks for 5 seconds
  • Grav Cannon spread reduced
  • Grav Cannon and Heavy Bolter heat removal rate increased
  • Grenade stun distance reduced
  • Healing rates increased

title: ECR 1.6.1
content:
Fixes:
  • Issue with stun immunity in melee fixed
  • Blood Angel tactical squad was removed from Maccrage's Fury
  • Scaling on player amount in PvE now doesn't account for observers
  • Full matches are no longer shown in match search
  • Ally Watch camera mode was changed
  • Replays are once again recorded, if you are not a host

title: ECR 1.6.0: TYRANID INFESTATION
content:
New content:
  • New PvE mode: "Horde" on new map "Forge of The Molten Vein"
  • A lot of UX improvements for shooting, reloading, health control, etc.
Fixes:
  • Nicknames in Ally Watch System fixed
  • Multi kills of one character fixed
  • For players who couldn't connect to Yandex infrastructure it's no longer required in-game
  • Melta bomb lack of damage to vehicles fixed
  • ATGM SFX and VFX fixes, cooldown fixed
  • Friendly fire damage on wounded XP penalty is no longer applied
  • For Duel mode victory condition fixed: team with biggest player amount wins if timer reaches zero
  • Tried to fix visibility issues on vehicles
  • Melee hit registration fixed
  • On Valorant Salvation spawn points for attackers are no longer mixed up
  • Improved item usage on other players distance
Balance:
  • Heavy bolter and Autocannon accuracy improved
  • ATGM speed increased, cooldown increased

title: ECR 1.5.4
content:
New content:
  • New map: Blood Angels Battle Barge "Valorous Salvation"
Fixes:
  • Stamina loss during clashes fixed
  • Watching enemies and bots via Ally Watch System fixed
  • Invisibility of characters while possessing a vehicle fixed
  • No cursor for Ally Watch System fixed
  • Fixed soft impact for Jump Packs

title: ECR 1.5.3: Motorized Onslaught
content:
New content:
  • New vehicle class: bike with two heavy bolters!
  • Ally watching system
  • New map: Maggon Station
Fixes:
  • Elimination mode fixed: an issue when XP wasn't granted for kills was resolved

  • Hopefully finally fixed non-exiting ADS bug
  • Shooting from behind walls fixed
  • Language being reset fixed

title: ECR 1.5.2
content:
Fixes:

  • Some RU localization fixes
Balance:

  • Devastators' evades movement distance reduced

title: ECR 1.4.4
content:
Fixes:

  • Character deceleration and friction was reset to default

title: ECR 1.4.3
content:
Large changes:
  • 3 new maps: Promethium Mine, Canyon Wasteyard, Torias Refinery
  • New character and vehicles physics
  • SFX for taking bolter damage
  • Melee combat significantly reworked (a lot of timings changed, evades now save direction of view, can walk during strong attack charge)

  • Duel now requires 3 wins instead of 2 and disables spawn protection
  • Veteran cost are now normalized by the XP difference between teams when it becomes significant

  • Vehicles now have sounds and leave snow trails
  • Missing textures fixed for Blackbolt towers and Ultramarines corpses on maps

Balance:

  • In Supremacy mode attackers gain more victory tickets for control over objectives

content:
New content:

  • Color modes for various types of vision deficiency

Balance:

  • More hedgehogs to the god of hedgehogs

  • Ground Assault's health reduced

  • Jump Pack's (standard and veteran) health reduced
  • Autocannon damage and accuracy increased

  • Heavy bolter damage increased

title: ECR 1.1.0: NEVERENDING DREAM
content:
The alpha-version of Eternal Crusade: Resurrection is finally released, one and a half year after the game shutdown. It includes:
  • 1 map (point A of the EC Zedek map)
  • 1 game mission: Deep Strike, where attackers have to control at least 2 points to be able to capture the previous A point, now marked as D, and win the match
  • 3 classes: Tactical, Ground Assault and Jump Pack Assault
  • 2 factions: LSM and CSM, assigned randomly
  • Advanced settings, including video settings, audio settings, keybindings and mouse sensitivity
  • 3 Space Marine Chapters (Blood Angels, Ultramarines and Dark Angels) and 3 Chaos Legions (Black Legion, Night Lords and Word Bearers)
  • Matchmaking P2P system based on players hosting their own matches
